participant_1.background:
I lie to my children about eating healthy.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.
i learned piano at age 6.
I'd love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.

participant_2.background:
I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
i want to be alone sometimes.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
my children are mostly grown.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do?
I love to go to antique stores and 80s music venues!  I am also moving to a new city to be closer to them.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  What else do you do for fun?
I also enjoy live music and hanging out with my friends.  I am proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
That is great!  I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.  I also have two dogs, one pitbull and old english bulldog.
That is awesome!  I would love to have a dog but I do not have the time right now.
I understand that.  I used to lie to my children about eating healthy but now I am trying to be more honest with them.
I am glad that you are trying to be more honest with your children.  I would love to have lunch with my old coach, who taught me everything I know about football.
That sounds like a great idea!  I love to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
That sounds so relaxing!  I am glad that you have such a great companion in your dog.
Me too!  I am glad that we had a chance to chat.  I hope you have a great day!
You too!  It was nice to meet you
